member.name: M:customer.Validation.isNumericVal(System.String)
member.summary: This function will take a string and check if it is numeric or not. Returns false if not numeric.
member.returns: False if string is not numeric
member.remarks: Do not pass array, and string is byval, not ref.

member.name: M:customer.Validation.isAlphaNumericVal(System.String)
member.summary: This function will take a string and check if it consists of or using both letters and numerals.
member.remarks: Do not pass array, and string is byval, not ref.

member.name: M:customer.Validation.isEmailVal(System.String)
member.summary: This function will take a string and check if it is an Email or not. Returns false if not a proper Email.
member.returns: False if the string is not a proper email
member.remarks: Do not pass array, and string is byval, not ref.
